forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 50F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low around 5C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 41F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 4C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 39F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High near 55F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
